price: Anayajua yaliyo mbele yao na yaliyo nyuma yao. Na kwa Mwenyezi Mungu yatarejeshwa mambo yote.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ
footnotes: Na Yeye Subhanahu anajua hali zao zilizo dhaahiri na za ndani. Hapana kinacho fichika kwake. Na kwake Yeye pekee ndiyo yanarejea mambo yote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu mā bayna aydīhim wamā khalfahum wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
